scripts.build:shared: npm ci && npm run build --workspace shared
scripts.build:obs: npm ci && npm run build --workspace observability
scripts.build:base: npm ci && docker build -f Dockerfile.base.nodejs -t cqrs-mvp/base:latest .
scripts.compose:all: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f orders/docker-compose.yml -f calendars/docker-compose.yml -f shop/docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.obs.yml --profile obs up --build -d
scripts.up: npm run build:base && npm run compose:all
scripts.down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f orders/docker-compose.yml -f calendars/docker-compose.yml -f shop/docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.obs.yml --profile obs down
